chunks.text:
Avrupa Minerals Ltd. (TSX-V: AVU) is pleased to announce that initial scout drilling at the Kangasjärvi volcanogenic massive sulfide target, located in the Pyhäsalmi Mining District of central Finland, started during the past week.  The Company plans to drill two holes, totaling up to 1,000 meters, on the first of two strong, previously un-tested, geophysical targets located in close proximity to historic mining at the location.

During the mid-1980’s, Finnish mining company Pyhäsalmi Mine Oy exploited, via open pit, a small high grade massive sulfide deposit with an in-house calculated resource of approximately 300,000 mt @ 5.4% zinc.  The property had remained dormant and un-explored since that time until Akkerman Finland Oy (AFOy—49% Avrupa Minerals, 51% Akkerman Exploration BV) acquired the exploration rights in 2022.  AFOy performed an airborne electromagnetic survey (SkyTEM) covering the general mine area and nearby mineral targets, and producing two standout EM conductors close-in to the old mine, but in areas where there has been no historic drilling.

Click here to learn more about the project <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnewsletter.montpelliercorp.com%2Fgo%2F835331-68312-4322823&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4fdcbaff39f84fe976d008dcf3e9120c%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653430711980059%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C60000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=FqXO3juXJXoKFLb8Go9Z6c2n6NVc2QfHs4mAYhZte%2F8%3D&reserved=0>

Avrupa Minerals Ltd. (TSX-V: AVU, US OTC: AVPMF, FRANKFURT: 8AM) is a dynamic and growth-oriented junior exploration and development company, focused on the discovery of high-potential mineral deposits. Operating through a hybrid prospect generator business model, the company strategically develops early-stage exploration projects in collaboration with joint venture partners. Avrupa’s current flagship asset is the 100%-owned Alvalade VMS Project in Portugal, which has been optioned to MATSA under an earn-in joint venture agreement. This partnership exemplifies Avrupa’s ability to attract strong partners and advance promising projects toward development and production.

With a focus on politically stable and resource-rich regions, Avrupa is actively generating and developing exploration projects across Europe, particularly in Portugal and Kosovo. The company’s experienced management team is committed to discovering high-value opportunities and creating long-term shareholder value. As Avrupa continues to explore new mineral-rich areas, it remains dedicated to expanding its portfolio, seeking strategic partnerships, and leveraging its unique business model to achieve sustainable growth.

The company’s experienced management team is committed to discovering high-value opportunities and creating long-term shareholder value. As Avrupa continues to explore new mineral-rich areas, it remains dedicated to expanding its portfolio, seeking strategic partnerships, and leveraging its unique business model to achieve sustainable growth.

chunks.text:
Magnetite Mines’ flagship Razorback Iron Ore Project is a high-grade magnetite iron ore project capable of producing premium Direct-Reduction grade (“DR-grade”) iron ore products required for low-carbon and zero-carbon steel production. The Project is 100% owned and operated by ASX-listed Magnetite Mines Limited (ASX: MGT).

The Project, consisting of the Razorback and Iron Peak deposits, has Probable Ore Reserves of 2.0 billion tonnes and Mineral Resources of 4.5 billion tonnes (JORC 2012). It is located just 240 kilometres northeast of Adelaide in arid, low-intensity pastoral country and benefits from proximity to existing infrastructure including open-user rail (~45km), the renewables-weighted South Australian grid (~120km) and a number of Spencer Gulf ports (~200km).

Click here to learn more about the Razorback Project <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnewsletter.montpelliercorp.com%2Fgo%2F835334-111471-4322823&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4fdcbaff39f84fe976d008dcf3e9120c%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653430712075367%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C60000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Xop%2B6WR%2F7Zr0fyst%2FS8Gkl4mTOI%2FiLQloW4J6yXgrJY%3D&reserved=0>

<https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnewsletter.montpelliercorp.com%2Fgo%2F835340-356873-4322823&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4fdcbaff39f84fe976d008dcf3e9120c%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653430712159615%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C60000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=NE3jdWgBh07vum4LM1FBFWUvXKhZVACJ7xhJGVciMd8%3D&reserved=0> 

 	 
 	 
 	 The Company is developing its 100% owned Razorback Iron Ore Project located in South Australia’s Braemar Iron Formation with Stage 1 operations designed to produce 5Mtpa of magnetite concentrates, expandable to 10Mtpa. The global steel industry has committed to decarbonise steelmaking and the timing of this development is in line with the forecast increase in demand for premium-quality iron ore products required to produce green iron and consequently green steel. Green iron, which is produced using hydrogen instead of coal, is the key ingredient of “green steel” and is expected to attract a premium price. An explanation of “green iron” can be found here.

Currently Australia does not produce any iron ore or magnetite concentrate products that meet the very high-quality specifications required for green iron production. The Company’s Razorback Iron Ore Project can produce the required specification of DR-grade, very low impurity products necessary for green iron production and is designed to deliver long-term supply of magnetite concentrates to enable a new green iron production and export industry.

VANCOUVER, BRITISH COLUMBIA, September 23, 2024 (TSXV: PINN; OTC: NRGOF; Frankfurt: P9J) – Pinnacle Silver and Gold Corp. (“Pinnacle” or the “Company“) is pleased to provide an update on corporate activities.  As previously stated, the Company is actively engaged in seeking out new silver and gold exploration and development opportunities in the Americas, with particular focus on Mexico and Peru.

Mexico is the largest silver producing country in the world and has more primary silver mines than any other country.  Peru is the third largest silver producer and has the largest silver reserves and resources of any country. 

Many projects have already been reviewed and due diligence is being conducted on select opportunities, including site visits, and management is encouraged by the quality of assets that are potentially available for acquisition.  The focus is on high-grade underground targets, especially in Mexico where there remains some uncertainty regarding open pit mining.

<https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnewsletter.montpelliercorp.com%2Fgo%2F835338-78079-4322823&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4fdcbaff39f84fe976d008dcf3e9120c%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653430712260459%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C60000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Tq0yh4SQ1lMDmCjfWMZPWNLM0clKM%2F3LVDL875ryNOU%3D&reserved=0> 

 	 
 	 
 	 Pinnacle Silver and Gold Corp. (TSXV: PINN) is a dynamic exploration company focused on unlocking significant value in the Red Lake Mining Division of Northwestern Ontario. The company’s two flagship gold projects include the past-producing, high-grade Argosy Gold Mine, which remains open to depth, and the adjacent North Birch Project, offering exciting blue-sky potential. Both projects are strategically located within 10-12 kilometres of the Springpole Gold Deposit, currently being developed by First Mining Gold, highlighting the area's potential as a new and relatively underexplored district for gold exploration.

In addition to its Canadian projects, Pinnacle is actively seeking other district-scale opportunities across the Americas, with a particular emphasis on silver and gold. Led by an experienced and successful management team, Pinnacle Silver and Gold is committed to building sustainable, long-term value for its shareholders through its disciplined exploration approach and a growing portfolio of high-quality assets.
